text: Andhera jan'ya dosa ne'i, khanjera jan'ya dosa ne'i, rugnera jan'ya dosa ne'i ebam tomadera nijedera jan'ya'o dosa ne'i kha'oya-da'oya kara tomadera ghare athaba tomadera pitadera ghare, matadera ghare, bha'idera ghare, bonadera ghare, caca-jethadera ghare, phuphudera ghare, mamadera ghare, khaladera ghare athaba sesaba ghare yegulora cabira malika tomara athaba tomadera bandhudera ghare.
